text: Digaula gaa kumi nia dagi dogolua o Midian, go Oreb mo Zeeb, digaula ga daaligi Oreb gii made i Tadugalaa Oreb, gei ogo Zeeb la i di Gowaa Dagadagahi Waini a Zeeb. Digaula ga waluwalu hua igolo digau Midian, ga gaamai nia libogo o Oreb mo Zeeb gi Gideon, dela gu i bahi i dua di monowai Jordan i di madagoaa deelaa.
